precaution: Remove any objects you may knock off from the table
instruction: Sit at the table with a bowl containing three colored spheres—yellow, red, and blue—, a towel, and a tong in front of you.
Pick up the tongs with your right hand.
Use the tongs to pick up the yellow bead from the bowl.
Move the yellow bead onto the towel and release it gently.
Next, use the tongs to pick up the red bead from the bowl.
Move the red bead onto the towel and release it.
Then, pick up the blue bead from the bowl using the tongs.
Place the blue sphere on the towel.
Next, place the tongs on the table
